title: Super Nintendo World Focuses on "Interactive Experiences" - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.15.20
description:
Hurry to http://upstart.com/kfgames to find out HOW LOW your Upstart rate is.

If you go to http://getquip.com/games right now, you’ll get your first refill free!

Get started with your first month of Hims free by going to http://forhims.com/gamesdaily.

It's a slow news day. So Blessing and Gary Whitta spice things up with talks of Super Nintendo World details, Gamestop stocks plummeting, and a new segment where "Gary Judges You".

Time Stamps - 
00:06:30 - Housekeeping
Book of Eli’s 10th Anniversary is today
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:07:27 - GameStop Stock Plummets After A 27.5% Decrease In Holiday Sales, this comes from Matt Perez of Forbes
00:25:18 - Super Nintendo World to focus on "interactive experiences", this is from Rebekah Valentine over at Gamesindustry.biz
00:32:50 - Valve Index out of stock around the globe ahead of Half-Life: Alyx launch, this comes from Haydn Taylor over on Gamesindustry.biz
00:37:45 - Layoffs reported at Perfect World Europe, this is by Haydn Taylor of Gamesindustry.biz (2 points for Haydn)
00:39:20 -Mobile gaming projected to surpass $100b in spend in 2020, this is by Rebekah Valentine of Gamesindustry.biz (2 points for Rebekah)
00:41:30 - Out today
00:47:11 -  Upstart
00:48:15 -  HIMS
00:51:10 -  QUIP
 Reader mail   -
00:52:10 - With time being limited for people what characteristics do you look for when wanting to play a game that is games as a service? - Frank Furtter
01:00:08 - Squad Up: Josh(PSN) -TheFarmerJosh
01:00:30 - GARY JUDGES YOU
01:08:50 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing & Fran
